sub-title: ASSISTIVE BASKETBALL DEVICE FOR VISUALLY IMPAIRED
about-content: The GoalFinder device assists visually impaired players by playing sounds and illuminating a target strip to indicate the basket, and by providing visual and auditory feedback for successful or missed shots. It’s easy to configure through the GoalFinder Web App, which lets users set up and play different games and challenges.
mission-0-content: People with visual impairments should be full members of society, not a burden—equally included in everyday life and in sports. That's why we created the GoalFinder device, to make it easier for blind and low‑vision players to enjoy basketball.
mission-1-content: GoalFinder should serve its purpose efficiently while remaining accessible to everyone. By making the project 100% open source, we ensure that the full functionality is available to all, maximizing its impact and usefulness.
mission-2-content: A real open source project thrives only when supported by its community. We deeply appreciate feedback from our users and encourage developers to contribute their ideas and skills.
features-step-1-content: Mount and set up the GoalFinder. Use the Web App to make further adjustments and launch games or challenges
features-step-2-content: With the GoalFinder, a customizable sound and flashing light strip guides players to the basket.
features-step-3-content: The GoalFinder provides both auditory and visual feedback for hits and misses, while also giving real-time insights into the gameplay
quote: With the Goalfinder project, the students of HTL Leonding impressively demonstrate what innovation can achieve. ... This project combines cutting-edge technology with social responsibility – thereby making a valuable contribution to our society.
award-0-content: New technologies for people with disabilities
award-1-content: Promoting social engagement and societal awareness among youth
doc-content: As a open source project we want to provide a as detailed as possible documentation. Both for casual or new users in a non tech focused way as well as for those interested in the GoalFinder's technology.
cta-content: Join our community and help make basketball accessible for everyone.
